storyInfo: The Dublinn soldiers are at tense standstill with the Sarkaz troops. At the same time, Horn remains blended in with the crowd. Incited by her and the mysterious figures in the shadows, Dublinn and the Sarkaz clash.

attributes.content: Amiya, at this rate, Mr. Thomas is going to get captured by Dublinn again!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Are you planning to...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: That bloody bugger!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'll bring him back.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Why are you stopping me? Didn't we go through all the trouble to rescue that bloke?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The situation's changed. We can't blow Siege's cover.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: So you're just gonna let him go? That's not how the Glasgow Gang does things!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't make a ruckus here, either of you.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Vina...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Listen to Amiya and the Doctor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sniper operators, on the enemies holding our mark.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: The important thing is that caster.

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: Caster......

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: If I recall correctly, Doctor.
attributes.joined: Caster...... If I recall correctly, Doctor.

attributes.content: According to Misery's intel and Bagpipe's report, she's the leader of Dublinn's forces inside Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And one of the instigators of the County Hillock incident.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island doesn't put the blame for Outcast's sacrifice entirely on her shoulders, but it's not just Misery and Bagpipe who hold a grudge against her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Bagpipe tells us she's very hard to deal with.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We could get into a fight with Dublinn here, rescue Mr. Thomas, and even eliminate Mandragora, a formidable enemy who may pose a significant threat to our future operations.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are coming!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We're too late.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All squads, continue to conceal yourselves––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Be ready to engage.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's going on over here? So noisy.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Oh, if it isn't you traitorous lot.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don't you dare use that word.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: We have nothing to do with Victoria now, devil.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Hmph... Who said you could call us that?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hah... A motley band of exiles, taking advantage of the chaos to occupy a city. What made you delusional enough to think yourselves the masters of Londinium?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Haha, don't lump me in with your sorry band, thinking we actually give a damn about Londinium.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The place is shiny and clean, isn't it? Doesn't reek of death. But if you ask me, it'll be more pleasing to the eye once it's burnt to cinders.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are only here because our King is here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Their King? The Sarkaz King?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Are they talking about Theresis?;The regent finally decided to crown himself?

attributes.content: I haven't heard anything about that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But a lot of intel reports disparate Sarkaz fighters gathering in Londinium from across Terra, and it's not just the mercenaries we're familiar with.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There are... older, stronger powers now hovering around the heart of this city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I can feel it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Since coming here, with each step closer I take, those emotions flow into the depths of my heart... tangle around my thoughts, and grow stronger and stronger.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm fine, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just that... for a split second, it's as if...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When I heard those Sarkaz mention their 'King,' a wisp of those emotions... sprung up and latched onto me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't think I can give a better description of what I felt...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'd love to spend some time talking this through with you... but not now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if there were... a Sarkaz King who now controls Londinium, that doesn't change our mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We came here to prevent a war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need to figure out exactly what they're doing, and what they're trying to do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ––And that has nothing to do with what Theresis decides to call himself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, can we skip past the shitty pleasantries, Dublinn?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Turn over the man you captured.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Why should I?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: We'll take good care of your old home.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You bastard––!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Captain...!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Not just you. You too, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I know who you are, Feline. You're their commander.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: But why should I listen to you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Because I've been to the Palace of Westhaleg.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Haha, we've all heard the story. You wanted an audience with His Majesty, but he had you escorted out.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Do you really think you mean anything to the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Captain, why do we just sit here and let the devils mock us?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I can't take it anymore. Ever since we came to Londinium, we've had to live with this inferior race—
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Not one more word.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: We can go back and bring this up with the Leader...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I said, not one more word!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Sarkaz, no matter how hard you try to provoke me, I'm not leaving.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: We are your guests, as the one you call 'His Majesty' and his privy council agreed.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Do you really want to find out how the Sarkaz deal with rowdy 'guests?'
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Well, at least one of us understands proper etiquette.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: We promised your regent and your generals that Dublinn's troops would not set foot into Central Londinium.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Likewise, you should not be detaining me here, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Or, do you devils struggle to keep your word? Can you even spell 'trustworthy?'
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Hah, you uppity Feline... Isn't the fact that I haven't chopped you into pieces right here and now already proof that I'm honoring our little pretend friendship?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: If a Sarkaz ever forgot his objective and started picking fights, he'd be found dead in a bar near a warzone pretty quick.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We're here to root out some bottom feeders. These nobodies haven't learned their place yet. They're sneaking around, making a mess of our work––
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: By the sound of things, they're not looking for Mr. Thomas either.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Could that be the friends the Messenger mentioned, the ones who can help us with our operation?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz certainly would call them an enemy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If they really are right here, maybe we could help them...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The line stopped moving.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I hear fighting... the Sarkaz must've gotten into a row with someone.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant, I saw their uniforms... it's Dublinn!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Her.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The Dublinn caster?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: She... She's a scary one...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: She's killed some of our people. She impales them on stone pillars that come out of nowhere. Her methods are even more brutal than the Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant, have you fought her too? What am I even saying? You've saved so many from Dublinn, you must've beaten her...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I lost.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But you... still managed to get away from her with your life. That's already amazing enough.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I'm still not exactly sure why she didn't kill me on the spot... but I have my guesses.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: At the Barracks outside Londinium, I saw them having secret meetings with a count's Messenger.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I figured she must've shown me deliberately.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Or maybe it wasn't her. Someone like her would have no way of knowing that my grandfather and the count's father served together. They were very close.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: And the count himself... If I recall correctly, was squire to a duke.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Sorry, I shouldn't be saying all this.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: During the long period of time I was hiding in the dark bowels of this city, I... got used to talking to the metal crabs. They didn't have much to say back.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I didn't have to worry about my words casting a shadow over anyone else.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Some things, I just had to say to myself so I wouldn't forget them.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I didn't mean to interrupt you, Lieutenant!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I'd actually like to hear more. For the longest time, I've been wanting to know who's pulling the strings up there, causing us all this misery!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: The duke I was thinking of isn't even in Londinium right now. Or rather, I should say... he never cared a lick about the vacant throne in the city.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If he really were secretly supporting Dublinn, that would answer a lot of questions. But at the same time, it would also greatly complicate the crisis we have on our hands...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Listen to me. Everything I've said to you up to this point is just baseless speculation. If you want to hear more, we'll continue another time.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Provided... you're willing to follow me into the shadows.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What are we going to do now?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Right now... we need to find an opportunity to escape.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Dublinn has been trying to get something from the Sarkaz. It might be one individual or several, which is why they've set up in Sudean.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: In addition to troops like you, hunted by the Sarkaz, they've captured a good lot of civilians with some connection to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Whatever Mandragora is trying to accomplish...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: As long as it creates conflict between Dublinn and the Sarkaz, it'll work in our favor.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Sounds like you have a plan.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Robben, did you make sure to hide the crossbow I gave you? Up your sleeves, right?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Of course, Lieutenant!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Aim at that Dublinn soldier, the one closest to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It looks like Dublinn isn't backing down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have a limit to their patience. This is going to boil over into a fight, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, we're going to have to use our backup plan.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: C'mon, turn him over and you all get to walk out of here alive. Let's make things easy for each other, why don't we?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Captain, shouldn't we...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I don't understand...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: No means no.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Even if it fractures our relationship with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: You heard what they had to say.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: When... have we ever been friends?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: There you go. Those are your words, not mine.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ––Formation! Round up these Dublinn wretches!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: He is absolutely critical to Dublinn. Non-negotiable.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: If we can't bring him with us, our only option is to kill him here.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Waaaah!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Shut your trap.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Actually, our other option... is to kill all these Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Isn't it about time we make our entrance?
Hold on, we're still calibrating the aerial coordinates.
Look, if we don't act now, someone's gonna get killed.
Give me a sec... Seventeen meters in a straight line... Sixteen... Fifteen...
Best to get a bit closer or you might have trouble aiming, right?
No can do. They'll spot us if I get any closer!
Just do as I say. It won't miss, trust me, or I'll let you use my head as a rivet— Move it a little eastward and the reflection of light should cover its wings...
Now!
attributes.joined: Just do as I say. It won't miss, trust me, or I'll let you use my head as a rivet— Move it a little eastward and the reflection of light should cover its wings...Now!

attributes.content: Rock-5, you're up!
That's our cue.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Robben, now!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hey, hey, hey–– Gah!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: What's the meaning of this?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The hell are you talking about? You're the ones who tried to snipe us––
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Fight back!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Those who spill Sarkaz blood will pay the blood debt with interest!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don't let a single one out of here alive!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Remember, you started this.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: ––With me. Slaughter every last Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Don't let a single one live to tell the tale.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: The devil leadership mustn't learn what happened here today.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaahhhh––!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Save me! Someone, anyone!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Amiya, these civilians have nowhere to run... It's not just Mr. Thomas, so many are going to get caught in the crossfire!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Neither the Sarkaz nor Dublinn have any regard for civilian lives!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya, I'm sorry, but I can't just stand by and let this happen.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I just can't.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All operators, there's been a change in plans!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All non-combat personnel are to remain hidden. All combat personnel, save as many lives as you can. But mind your own safety!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Another bolt from behind?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It came from those ones, in civilian clothes... They're carrying unauthorized weapons!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Something's not right. We've got more hostiles in the elevator!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hah... Looks like we've grabbed the pest's tail.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Turns out the rebels ARE here––
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Report this to General Manfred right away!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior
